# copySubject

**Type Property**

An index for the copy-subject menu item.

## Declaration

```swift
static let copySubject: Int
```

## Manage Framework-provided menu items

- **copyImage**: An index for the copy-image menu item.
- **shareImage**: An index for the share-image menu item.
- **shareSubject**: An index for the share-subject menu item.
- **lookupItem**: An index for the Visual Look Up menu item.
